Policies & House Notes

How are compliments verified?

Our front desk evaluates tone, originality, and eye contact. Overused phrases may be returned for revision.

Can I prepay with a bundle?

Yes. The ten-compliment starter roll applies to any future weekday booking.

Do you host events?

We host retirement dinners, budget meetings, and moonlight vow renewals on the conservatory terrace.

Pet policy?

Only one resident dog is permitted. He is the owner, chief executive, and final approver.
